content.query:
USE electric_vehicle_explorer;

/* Mostrar información del vehículo y su clasificación del tercer trimestre del 2024
Ejemplo de datos a continuación:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
vin             modelYear      make         model       classification                              year        month
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7SAYGAEEXP      2023           TESLA        MODEL Y     Eligibility unknown as battery range ...    2024        08
1N4AZ0CP2D      2013           NISSAN       LEAF        Clean Alternative Fuel Vehicle Eligible     2024        08
1FMCU0E15R      2024           FORD         ESCAPE      Clean Alternative Fuel Vehicle Eligible     2024        08
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*/


-- Primera Forma -> 54649
SELECT 
        v.vin, v.modelYear, v.make, v.model
        , classification
        , vr.filepath(1) AS year, vr.filepath(2) AS month
FROM OPENROWSET(
                    BULK 'cafv_eligibility.json',
                    DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
                    FORMAT = 'CSV',
                    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
                    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
                    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
                )
                WITH(
                    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
                ) AS cafv_eligibility
                CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
                WITH(
                    cafv_eligibility_id SMALLINT '$.cafvEligibility',
                    classification      VARCHAR(100)
                )
    INNER JOIN
     OPENROWSET(
                    BULK 'vehicle.csv',
                    DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
                    FORMAT = 'CSV',
                    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
                    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
                    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
                    ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
                )
                WITH(
                    vehicleId           INT,
                    vin                 VARCHAR(10),
                    modelYear           SMALLINT,
                    make                VARCHAR(25),
                    model               VARCHAR(25),
                    cafvEligibilityId   SMALLINT
                ) AS [v]
    INNER JOIN
     OPENROWSET(
                    BULK 'vehicle_registration_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
                    DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
                    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
                ) 
                WITH(
                    vehicleId           INT,
                    registrationDate    DATETIME2(7)
                )AS vr
    ON (v.vehicleId = vr.vehicleId)
    ON (v.cafvEligibilityId = cafv_eligibility_id)
WHERE vr.filepath(1) = '2024' AND vr.filepath(2) IN ('06', '07', '08', '09');



-- Segunda Forma -> 54649
WITH cte_cafv_eligibility AS
(
    SELECT cafv_eligibility_id, classification
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'cafv_eligibility.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH(
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS cafv_eligibility
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH(
        cafv_eligibility_id SMALLINT '$.cafvEligibility',
        classification      VARCHAR(100)
    )
),
cte_vehicle AS
(
    SELECT
        *
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'vehicle.csv',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
            FORMAT = 'CSV',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
            HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
            FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
            ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
        )
        WITH(
            vehicleId           INT,
            vin                 VARCHAR(10),
            modelYear           SMALLINT,
            make                VARCHAR(25),
            model               VARCHAR(25),
            cafvEligibilityId   SMALLINT
        ) AS [result]
),
cte_vehicle_registration AS
(
    SELECT
        vr_data.*,
        vr_data.filepath(1) AS year,
        vr_data.filepath(2) AS month
    FROM OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'vehicle_registration_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
            FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
        ) 
        WITH(
            vehicleId           INT,
            registrationDate    DATETIME2(7)
        )AS vr_data
)
SELECT cv.vin, cv.modelYear, cv.make, cv.model
        , cce.classification
        , cvr.year, cvr.month
FROM cte_vehicle AS cv 
INNER JOIN cte_vehicle_registration AS cvr ON (cv.vehicleId = cvr.vehicleId)
INNER JOIN cte_cafv_eligibility AS cce ON (cv.cafvEligibilityId = cce.cafv_eligibility_id)
WHERE year = '2024' AND month IN ('06', '07', '08', '09');
